Priest of Dawn:
[ Seal of Strife ]
The Seal of Strife bestows the following abilities:
Strong Defensive Mercenaries: The lord of each castle is allowed to hire unusually strong mercenaries.
Enhanced Protection of Castle Gates and Walls: The strength of castle gates and walls is slightly improved.
Cost Reductions: The costs of upgrading castle gates and walls is decreased.
Increased Tax Rate: The maximum tax rate is increased.
Other: If the Revolutionaries of Dusk possess the Seal of Strife, you will not be able to ride a wyvernduring the seal validation period.
"I wish to fight for the Seal of Strife."
